title: Triple ductal mutiny (plus one loyalist :-)
content:
Out of four possible -significant- horizontal flips, three "happened":  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/9059689466/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816072628/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/9059689466/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/9059689466/")  
The thing is, I like it.  
(Related: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/4091231975](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816072628/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/4091231975 "http://www.flickr.com/photos/48413419@N00/4091231975"))

We need to talk.

hhp
author: hrant
